title: Who Is Ghislaine Maxwell? Jeffrey Epstein’s Alleged Accomplice on Trial for Sex Trafficking
sub_head: Opening statements in the trial of the British socialite began Monday, Nov. 29
body:
Ghislaine Maxwell is a British socialite accused of conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse underage girls. “Maxwell enticed minor girls, got them to trust her, and then delivered them into the trap that she and Jeffrey Epstein had set,” then Acting U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss said in a July 2020 indictment. “She pretended to be a woman they could trust.”
Ms. Maxwell has pleaded not guilty. Her lawyers have argued she is a scapegoat for Epstein, who died in his jail cell in August 2019, about a month after his indictment on sex-trafficking charges. The medical examiner ruled his death a suicide.
